name: lmodsubid
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c4))

stmt.origin: sylan(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c4), wcel(c0, cgrp))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c4))

-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c4))

body.origin:

comment: Subtraction of a vector from itself. ( ~ hvsubid analog.) (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
